chapter.title: Datastore Manager
chapter.para: The Datastore Manager is intended for advanced-level DHIS2 users. You can read more about the Data store here: DHIS2 data store.

section.title: Using the Datastore Manager
section.para: The Datastore Manager lets you manage the content of the web API data stores. This is helpful when managing apps and external scripts.

section.title: Add a new namespace or key to the Datastore Manager

listitem.para: Enter a name for the namespace you want to create.
Enter a key value, and select Create. The new namespace displays in the left pane.

section.title: Delete a namespace or key from the Datastore Manager
section.para:
To delete a namespace, or key, click the Options menu, and then click Delete.
Click the Options menu, and then click Delete.
Click Delete.

section.title: Edit namespaces or keys in the Datastore Manager
section.para:
Use the Search tool to find namespaces or keys in your datastore. When you edit your content, you can toggle between the Tree view to get an overview of the contents of the Datastore, and the Code view to edit your code directly in the code editor. Remember to save your work by clicking the Save button.
In the Code view, you can edit your code. When you edit a line of code, it is highlighted in yellow.
Any errors are marked by the editor. If you hover over the error icon, you can view a short description of the error.
